title: Anchored Supervised Contrastive Learning for Long-Tailed Medical Image Regression
details: Z Li, Z Xing, H Liu, L Zhu, L Wan - Chinese Conference on Pattern Recognition and …, 2024
abstract: Imbalanced data distributions are common issues in image regression tasks, particularly in medical diagnosis where the inherent nature of the data is imbalanced. In these situations, the minority data is often of significant importance. Recent studies …
